LanguageData.GWGT.PawnPsyfocusGain: {PAWN_labelShort} is giving The Golden Throne {0} more power.
LanguageData.GWGT.NoThroneAttached: Not attached to The Golden Throne
LanguageData.GWGT.ThroneAlreadyExists: There is only one Golden Throne.
LanguageData.GWGT.ThroneroomNotAdequate: Throne must be placed in a roofed room with no beds, biotech buildings, anomaly buildings, altars, or work facilities.
LanguageData.GWGT.ModuleCannotFunction: Module cannot function due to no power or a nonfunctional Golden Throne.
LanguageData.GWGT.Alert_ThroneUnusableDescription: The Golden Throne is not functioning:\n{0}
LanguageData.GWGT.Alert_BadRoom: Throne must be housed in a fitting throne room, void of any work stations, altars, or beds.
LanguageData.GWGT.Alert_Outside: Throne must be housed in a throne room.
